home.title: Summarizing your lessons becomes child's play!
home.subtitle: With our tool, summarize your lessons easily and quickly, allowing you to optimize your learning time.

about.title: Don't waste time on your revisions anymore
about.description: With our application, you can summarize your lessons in just a few clicks. No need to spend hours rereading your notes, our app takes care of capturing the essentials!

testimonials.title: Your Feedback
testimonials.text1: Thanks to this app, I was able to optimize my study time and achieve better results
testimonials.text2: I recommend this app to all students who want to save time on their revisions
testimonials.text3: I've never been so efficient during my study sessions; I highly recommend this app!
